greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Matrix inverse of triangle A111536.
comment: The column sequences are derived from the logarithm of a factorial series (cf. A111537).
formula: T(n, n)=1 and T(n+1, n)=n+1, else T(n+k+1, k) = -A111537(k) for k>=1.
example: After initial terms, all columns are equal to -A111537.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 06 2005
